citations.narrative:
A review and documentation of the review of the contingency plan were last performed in February 2022. Two employees
were hired more than 30 days ago and have not received training on the contingency plan.
Failure of an annual review can lead to outdated information, and can negatively impact the health and well-being of the
animals due to a staff that is unprepared to mitigate the hazards and dangers associated with the identified risks. The plan
must be reviewed by the exhibitor at least on an annual basis to ensure that it adequately addresses the criteria listed in
paragraph (a) of section 2.134. Each licensee must maintain documentation of their contingency plans and annual
reviews, and documentation must be made available to APHIS upon request. In addition, when there are changes to the
plan as a result of the annual review, exhibitors must provide training for their personnel regarding their roles and
responsibilities within 30 days of making the changes, as per 2.134(c).
Correct by June 30, 2025.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n

narrative:
2.134 
   
Contingency planning. 
A review and documentation of the review of the contingency plan were last performed in February 2022. Two employees 
were hired more than 30 days ago and have not received training on the contingency plan.  
 
Failure of an annual review can lead to outdated information, and can negatively impact the health and well-being of the 
animals due to a staff that is unprepared to mitigate the hazards and dangers associated with the identified risks. The plan 
must be reviewed by the exhibitor at least on an annual basis to ensure that it adequately addresses the criteria listed in 
paragraph (a) of section 2.134. Each licensee must maintain documentation of their contingency plans and annual 
reviews, and documentation must be made available to APHIS upon request. In addition, when there are changes to the 
plan as a result of the annual review, exhibitors must provide training for their personnel regarding their roles and 
responsibilities within 30 days of making the changes, as per 2.134(c). 
 
Correct by June 30, 2025. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives. 
 
 n
